alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 15 at 7:00PM CST until February 19 at 12:33AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. For the Big Piney River...including Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate... flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, the Pontoon Training Area at Ft. Wood Floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 2.9 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon at 1200 PM CST.
